FuncDef: This command assigns a Frame Relay scheduling class for a Frame Relay SAP. The scheduling class dictates which queue the frame or frame fragments are stored in FRF.12 end-to-end fragmentation, FRF.12 UNI/NNI link fragmentation and MLFR applications.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the Frame Relay scheduling class number. Values-0 to 3.
